extendedInfo.description: Ultimate Word Search HD Free (Wordsearch) has 11 categories filled with fun word search puzzles. If you like Word Search puzzles, then this is the game for you! Select the words by clicking on the starting letter and then clicking on the ending letter. When the correct words are found they are automatically crossed out. Find all 12 words to get a new puzzle. Categories include: Animals, Christmas & Winter, Clothes, Countries, Elements, Foods, Fruits & Veggies, Human Body, Kings & Pirates, Plants & Trees, Sports Features: â 2 different themes to choose from. â 11 word categories with advanced engine to avoid repeats. â Find all 12 words to complete the puzzle. â Helps increase both vocabulary and spelling ability. â Great sound effects. â Fun and educational at the same. â Auto-save when you close it in the middle of a game. We hope you enjoy Ultimate Word Search Free (WordSearch)! The full Ultimate Word Search game has many more categories and includes music. If you like Ultimate Word Search Free then you should consider buying our Ultimate Word Search game.

reviews.title: Can\'t drag
reviews.comment: To hard to drag the words. Should be able to go backwards
reviews.author: Christina Collacci

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love racing against the clock and beating all my friends times lol... It\'s a lot of fun
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Small
reviews.comment: To small on my screen. Less letters would be nice to make the search letters bigger to see.
reviews.author: A Google User
